title: [NA] Losing LP For Losing a game I couldn't reconnect to.
body:
If you look my most recent ranked game it had said that I left. Prior to this game I was at 96 lp, Bronze 5 and was playing this to reach into my promos. On the client it said that it counted as a victory but during the game my internet decided to shit itself and resulted with me in the game still connected and I could see what was going on but I couldn't move myself. 500ms solid and frozen and so I checked the capabilities of my internet on other things like Google, Skype and see if those are connected and they worked fine, so I'm guessing it's probably just another server issue whereas I'm playing from somewhere in asia and the servers are much too far or something like that.  I ended up losing lp despite the fact that I couldn't do anything to reconnect, I did spend time in the game of course playing as jungle but still it counted as a leaver game in general and I lost lp from that. My view on it was that I'd remain at 96 lp again because if one is to leave whilst they are in their promos it'll end there.

op.gg: http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=NabilCola

I just want to know that is there an amount of time you need to play where you'll still earn the rewards in ranked as I've had similar situations in the past where I'm just playing a game all the way into 30 mins and I dc all of a sudden and as a result I couldn't reconnect into the game and ended up getting the rewards instead. Does it just work differently in ranked?

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
Sorry to hear about the loss, though I was unable to see any issues with the servers.  It sounds like your network is having problems reaching our game servers, and the physical distance can definitely be a set back.  Even though you can use skype or if your internet is fine, you can still have issue s connecting to specific services like our game server.  You can try out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection, but keep in mind you can't really exceed that physical distance.  

We can't adjust game stats or remove [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), because they do still cause others an negative experience.  Hopefully, that guide can help though!

Please forgive the butt-in, but I experienced this many times, and I think that there definitely needs to be a mechanism similar to bug-splat to report that the client bugged and didn't let you connect. It's not fair for people to get losses when it's a riot problem.

While there may not be "any issues with the servers", there are many other riot problems that make it impossible to connect, such as client bugs, updating client, two clients opening, etc. All of those have happened to me and I think it needs looking into how players can avoid penalties when they can't connect because of a riot issue, especially with 3 minute remake.
